short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your website's search engine rankings and protect against DDoS attacks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
***** FEATURES *****

üöÄ This extension allows users to generate customized HTML code with key meta tags for SEO, including Meta Open Graph and X (Twitter) Card information. This helps enhance visibility and improve ranking across all search engines. Additionally, it enables users to create favicons, ensuring a consistent and professional appearance across different browsers and devices. Users can input detailed information such as the site name, slogan, description, keywords, and canonical URL, as well as options to include Apple device icons, a common favicon, and to generate a sitemap.xml file, robots.txt, and an .htaccess file based on all SEO recommendations.

üéØ Furthermore, it includes Google PageSpeed Insights, allowing users to scan their website after making changes and view the results.

üîí In the security section, it includes SmartKiller Firewall (Free Version), a firewall against DDoS mitigation attacks created by FreddyDeveloper.

üèÜ So, if you‚Äôre looking to boost your search engine rankings with effective SEO without spending a fortune and keep your website protected against DDoS attacks, this extension is perfect for you.
